main.name: Abraham Joys
main.description: During my degree I have been described by my peers as a hardworking individual. This stems from the fact that I am currently: running a few app projects, juggling my course rep duties, and maintained a 74% in year 2. With Mathematics and Computer Science being my main interests, I have learnt how to think critically and analytically, to solve problems in a creative manner and how to get complex tasks done efficiently. I am willing to take any training necessary to learn new skills and better myself.
main.bio: I am just a really techy person who enjoys building stuff
main.contactmessage: Please email me if you would like to get in touch

testimonials.text: Abe is one of the best people I know

That Abraham Joys must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
